page.title: 08RELIGION
page.content: The{Parish Church}of St.Peter is in Claybrooke Parva and serves the villages of Claybrooke Magna, Claybrooke Parva and Ullesthorpe.The {Rector}of the Church is Father Stephen Haddlesey who has held the living since 1980.Services are held on Sundays and during the week as appropriate.Activities for young people are an integral part of the life of the Church. The{Congregetional Chapel}is in Manor Road,Ullesthorpe.It was built in 1825.Mrs Sandra Turner is the pastor. The Chapel is small with a wooden pulpit,wooden rails and stained glass windows.Services are held on Sundays. There is a youth club and also a club for 7 to 12 year old's called "Pilots" run by Sandra Turner and Mr.David West
